params._address: Address of registered utility contract template

params._fee: Fee in wei required for deployment
params._isActive: True if template can be deployed immediately

params._address: Address of registered utility contract template

params._initData: Initialization data passed to clone initialize
params._utilityContract: Address of registered utility contract template

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: Returns true if this contract implements the interface defined by `interfaceId`. See the corresponding https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-165#how-interfaces-are-identified[ERC section] to learn more about how these ids are created. This function call must use less than 30 000 gas.

params._contractAddress: Address of registered utility contract template
params._newFee: New fee in wei required for deployment

activateContract(address).notice: Enables deployment for registered utility contract template

addNewContract(address,uint256,bool).notice: Registers utility contract template in DeployManager

deactivateContract(address).notice: Disables deployment for registered utility contract template

deploy(address,bytes).notice: Deploys a new clone of registered utility contract template

updateFee(address,uint256).notice: Updates deployment fee for registered utility contract template
